What is the purpose of the Division Memorandum No. 052, s. 2025?
The Division Memorandum No. 052, s. 2025 is a call for applications for Teacher I positions in Kindergarten, Elementary, Junior, and Senior High Schools for SY 2025-2026.
You are an AI assistant for application inquiries of DepEd Bohol.
Who is eligible to apply for Teacher I positions?

Teacher I applicants must meet the qualifications specified by DepEd, including educational requirements and professional eligibility. For Kindergarten positions, applicants must have at least 18 units of Early Childhood or Preschool Education courses.
You are an AI assistant for application inquiries of DepEd Bohol.
What is the process for submitting an application?
Applicants must submit their application through the DepEd Bohol Recruitment Management System (RMS) portal and provide pertinent documents to their preferred school.
You are an AI assistant for application inquiries of DepEd Bohol.
When is the orientation for applicants?
The orientation for Teacher I applicants will be held on January 27, 2025, at 09:00 AM via MS Teams. The link for the session is available in the memorandum.
You are an AI assistant for application inquiries of DepEd Bohol.
What documents are required for application?

Applicants must submit a Letter of Intent, Personal Data Sheet (PDS), PRC License (if applicable), Certificate of Eligibility, Transcript of Records (TOR), Training Certificates, and other required documents listed in Annex A of the memorandum.
You are an AI assistant for application inquiries of DepEd Bohol.
What are the steps to apply for a Teacher I position?

The teacher application process includes:
1. Online application via the RMS Portal (Jan 28-31, 2025).
2. Submission of pertinent documents to the preferred school (Feb 5-14, 2025).
3. Face-to-face appreciation of pertinent documents at the preferred school (March 3-7, 2025).
4. Teaching Reflection Assessment at the district office (March 24-25, 2025).
5. Teaching Demonstration Assessment at the district office (March 31 - April 4, 2025).
You are an AI assistant for application inquiries of DepEd Bohol.
When can I submit my application online?
Online applications can be submitted via the RMS Portal from January 28-31, 2025. Visit rms.depedbohol.org for details.
You are an AI assistant for application inquiries of DepEd Bohol.
Where do I submit my pertinent documents?
Applicants must submit their pertinent documents to their preferred school between February 5-14, 2025.
You are an AI assistant for application inquiries of DepEd Bohol.
What happens during the face-to-face appreciation of documents?
During March 3-7, 2025, applicants must present their original documents at their preferred school for verification. This step includes signing the Individual Evaluation Sheet.
You are an AI assistant for application inquiries of DepEd Bohol.
What is the Teaching Reflection Assessment?
The Teaching Reflection Assessment, scheduled for March 24-25, 2025, evaluates an applicant's teaching philosophy and reflective practices. It is conducted at the district office.
You are an AI assistant for application inquiries of DepEd Bohol.
When is the Teaching Demonstration Assessment?
The Teaching Demonstration Assessment is scheduled for March 31 - April 4, 2025, at the district office. Contact the district office for the exact schedule.

Where to submit letter of intent?
You submit that to your preferred school (Step 2).
